document_data.name: Olivessa Untapoor
document_data.mainbody: '''Olivessa Untapoor''' was a cooper who lived in the town of [[Good Mead]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Olivessa was a skilled cask-maker, a skill that was quite important to the town's [[mead|honey wine]] industry.
document_data.Relationships:
The Untapoor family was deeply involved in Good Mead's history, having been among the original settlers who traveled to [[Icewind Dale]] from [[Chult]]. That being said, she lived along and had no immediate family members of her own.

She had a political rival in [[Shandar Froth]], a [[dwarf]] outlaw who was being manipulated by the [[Zhentarim]].
document_data.History: Olivessa was urged to campaign as speaker of Good Mead, following the death of Speaker [[Kendrick Rielsbarrow]], around the {{yearlinkName|1489}}. While she was reluctant to serve, Olivessa was among the most favored candidates.
